title: Ultimate Synthwave Music and SFX
description: 20 Synthwave Songs for your game! and some SFX as bonus
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


This synthwave music pack contains 20 songs longer than 3 minutes each that do not repeat in between. With it I'm sure your player will automatically go to that theme. The references are all futuristic-themed games.


Some songs are calm and peaceful, others faster, others happy, all of them have some function so your player doesn't lack sensations.


My goal with this is to provide you with high quality music at a super cool price, it's an investment that gives you an average of an hour of music, and they all loop perfectly!


Also, by investing in this you encourage me to continue my work and keep bringing quality work to the gamer development community.


Check the preview


List of music:

  • The red Dragon
  • Purple Night
  • Warm and Dangerous
  • Violent Wind
  • Streets of Duck
  • Elastic Pulse
  • Adamo's Help
  • Drag
  • Progression
  • Ultra Turrcan
  • Night's Knife
  • Z20
  • I Think it have ended already
  • The Easy Way
  • Before the call
  • Thrull
  • Almost There
  • Help Me
  • Tomorrow Night
  • The end


License:

non-exclusive license – you’re free to use these packs in your commercial games. No license to remix or claim as your own work
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 47

Number of Audio Cues: 47

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100Hz

Does music loop: (Yes/No) Yes

Minutes of audio provided: More than an hour

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Font: The font used on the thumb is "RoadRage", it's free and distributed by indieground.net.

And Good, it's free and distributed by dafont.com
